subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown winner who lost last weekend’s Travers Stakes, will race in the Breeders’ Cup Classic, then retire, his owner said.
snippet: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown winner who lost last weekend’s Travers Stakes, will race in the Breeders’ Cup Classic, then retire, his owner said.
